Class Person

java.lang.Object
  russell_cmis440_lab3.Person

public class Person
extends java.lang.Object

This object is the basic definition of a person for the purpose of the AddressBook program. It lays the foundation of what data on a person should be known. |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| | CRC: Person | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------| |Provides setter/getter methods for Person object AddressBookDisplay | |----------------------------------------------------------------------------|
